titleStmt.title: Bibliotheca Parliamenti: libri theologici, politici, historici, qui prostant venales in vico vulgo vocato Little-Britain. Classis secunda. Done into English for the Assembly of Divines.
Bibliotheca Parliamenti. Part 2.

notesStmt.note: Erroneously attributed to John Birkenhead. The work is an imitation of Birkenhead's "Paul's Church-yard" and "Two centuries of Pauls Church-yard", with some items taken directly from those works.
A satire on the Commonwealth in the form of booksellers' lists.
The last two leaves contain "The four-legg'd elder", in verse.
